participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and passionate about skateboarding, enjoys expressing himself through his style.
participant_1.background: my favourite skater is rob dryden. i've a broken arm. i am a skateboarder. my friends are all skateboarders. i'm always wearing a hat.

content.text: hi! how are you doing today?
